titles.title: Recalled Veterans Protection Act of 2017

To amend title 10, United States Code, to exempt members of the Armed Forces who voluntarily separate from active duty and incur a service-connected disability after being recalled to active duty from the requirement to repay voluntary separation pay.
Recalled Veterans Protection Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary:
Recalled Veterans Protection Act of 2017
This bill exempts members of the Armed Forces who voluntarily separate from active duty and incur a service-connected disability after being recalled to active duty or full-time National Guard duty from the requirement to repay voluntary separation pay.
